entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:31AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: Showers and thunderstorms continue across portions of the northern slopes of the Alaska Range. Radar estimates over the last 24 hours indicate rainfall amounts of 1-4 inches with isolated higher amounts. This rain will cause rises along streams and rivers feeding the Tanana River.
